oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hooks Takes Oath As Criminal Court Judge"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; judges; Criminal Court;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An article about Benjamin Hooks being sworn in as a judge in 1965. Includes information about the ceremony itself.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Covington, Jimmie
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Matthew Hicks and Katie Jakovich; Donated by Patricia Hooks Gray;
